Package niagara.optimizer.colombia

Interface Summary
Attribute Tuple attributes
ICatalog The interface Colombia expects from the database's catalog
Tracer A tracer object handles tracing events from the optimizer
 

Class Summary
AFTERS Pair of expr and cost value, used to sort expr according to their cost
ApplyRule ============================================================ ApplyRule - Task to Apply a rule to a Multi-Expression ============================================================
Attrs  
Bindery  
Bindery.BINDERY_STATE  
Context CONTEXTs/CONSTRAINTS on a search
Cost Cost of executing a physical operator, expression or multiexpression Cost cannot be associated with a multiexpression, since cost is determined by properties desired.
Domain Domains/Types
E_GROUP  
Expr Expressions An Expr corresponds to a detailed solution to the original query or a subquery.
Group  
Group.SearchResults  
LeafOp A placeholder for a group within rule patterns.
LogicalOp Logical operators
LogicalProperty Logical properties
MExpr MULTI_EXPRESSIONS MExpr is a compact form of Expr which utilizes sharing.
Move A Move is a pair of rule and promise, used to sort rules according to their promise
Node  
O_EXPR  
O_GROUP  
O_INPUTS  
Op Abstract superclass for all operators, logical or physical
Order  
Order.Kind  
PendingTasks PendingTasks is a collection of undone tasks is currently stored as a stack.
PhysicalOp PHYSICAL OPERATOR - class PhysicalOp
PhysicalProperty PhysicalProperty: PHYSICAL PROPERTIES
Rule  
RuleSet A RuleSet is a container of rules
SSP SEARCH SPACE We borrow the term Search Space from AI, where it is a tool for solving a problem In query optimization the problem is to find the cheapest plan for a given query subject to certain context (class Context).
Strings A container for strings, typically used for attribute names.
Task A task is an activity within the search process.
Winner Winner The key idea of dynamic programming/memoization is to save the results of searches for future use.
